message: being forced to toggle back and forth between topics in a very active group (like at a conference) is a pain
especially as your servers grind to a halt
being able to see a stream of all topics (like in bitchX) would be huge

@timocratic it's very alpha, but if you're a little python savvy you could give Conveggie a try. It has a live stream view that contains all new messages and new topics in your groups for viewing. http://github.com/adsworth/conveggie and http://convore.com/conveggie
